text: Yesli My posylali v kakoye-libo seleniye proroka Nashego, chtoby on prizyval narod k istinnoy vere v Allakha, a narod otvergal yego propoved', to My porazhali obitateley etogo seleniya bednost'yu i boleznyami, chtoby oni smirilis', umolyali iskrenne Allakha spasti ikh ot bedstviy i uverovali v to, k chemu prizyvayet Yego poslannik
